name: A thing of bygone days
description:
Photorealistic game about a journalist investigating a year old case, explore and uncover the secrets. The game consists of 2 fifteen minute episode. Share your impressions in the comments. write which episode you liked best and why. If the project gets support, I will release next episodes it soon.

Renowned journalist Edward Softly explores mysterious places. This time he came to the outskirts of a provincial town. According to newspaper clippings, the infamous surgeon moved here.

 The surgeon was charged with kidnapping and detaining people. What happened to them afterward is unknown. For a long time there was a trial during which it was not possible to establish the details of the case. the witness, who allegedly managed to escape, died in the hospital. And the surgeon himself disappeared from house arrest.

According to some information, the surgeon is hiding on the outskirts of the state, in a farm that once belonged to his grandfather.
